querySql: select trade_id,user_id,replace(replace(replace(`order_no`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`trans_no`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`refund_no`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),trade_type,source_type,replace(replace(replace(`trade_name`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`trade_body`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),account_id,account_amount,gift_available_amount,amount,gift_amount,replace(replace(replace(`trade_msg`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`trade_st_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`create_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`update_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),replace(replace(replace(`pay_time`,char(10),''), char(13), ''), char(1), ''),account_type from vvic_account_trade_detail
